question: Which nation houses the "Forbidden City"?
explanation: The "Forbidden City" is a palace-museum complex located in Beijing, China. It was the imperial palace of the Emperors of China from the Ming Dynasty to the Qing Dynasty, from 1420 to 1924. It was the political seat of the Chinese Government for almost 500 years. It was constructed from 1406 to 1420. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
